resources.string: Writes a trigger for this profile to a NFC tag
Enables or disables WiFi on tag detection
Enables or disables Bluetooth on tag detection
Sets the ringer to normal or silent mode on tag detection
Sets the AlarmClock on tag detection in day mode
Sets a time for the alarm clock
NFC tag toggled your device to day time mode!
NFC tag toggled your device to night time mode!
Please tap a NFC tag to write to.
Profile has been written to your NFC tag.
Writing to your NFC tag has failed.
It seems that your NFC adapter is currently disabled. Do you want to activate it?
